hero.title: Healing the self. Re-membering the world.
hero.sub: Where African wisdom meets psychology and midwifery to birth new ways of being.

pillars.title: Healing & Circles
pillars.body: Trauma-aware 1:1 sessions, couples/family circles, and group rituals.

pillars.title: Online Academy
pillars.body: Courses and cohorts rooted in African spiritual principles and practice.

pillars.title: Corporate Wellbeing
pillars.body: Women’s health, cultural competency and She‑Elephant leadership.

book_featured.title: Hearing Visions, Seeing Voices
book_featured.sub: A memoir of activism and spiritual becoming.
